olen.author: Abai Qunanbaiuly
olen.en_text: The mountain rests on a dark night
olen.description: A poetic image of calm and silence. Abai uses nature to convey stillness and contemplation.

olen.author: Abai Qunanbaiuly
olen.en_text: Mind, will, and heart must work together
olen.description: This line explains Abai’s philosophy of balance between intellect, strength of character, and emotion.

olen.author: Abai Qunanbaiuly
olen.en_text: If you want to become a true human
olen.description: A moral instruction encouraging personal growth, responsibility, and ethical behavior.

olen.author: Abai Qunanbaiuly
olen.en_text: Poetry is the king of words, the finest of speech
olen.description: Abai elevates poetry as the highest form of language and expression.

olen.author: Abai Qunanbaiuly
olen.en_text: Do not trust only yourself, think young one
olen.description: Advice on humility and critical thinking, warning against arrogance.

olen.author: Moldanazar
olen.en_text: My heart sings along with the wind
olen.description: A lyrical metaphor connecting emotions with nature and freedom.

olen.author: Moldanazar
olen.en_text: Those days will never return
olen.description: A nostalgic reflection on the irreversibility of time.

olen.author: Moldanazar
olen.en_text: I searched for peace within my heart
olen.description: Inner peace is presented as something personal and internal.

olen.author: Moldanazar
olen.en_text: When you come, the world becomes bright
olen.description: A romantic line showing how a loved one transforms perception of life.

olen.author: Moldanazar
olen.en_text: My road is long, but hope is alive
olen.description: Endurance and optimism despite difficulties.

olen.author: ARO
olen.en_text: Thoughts stayed with me through the night
olen.description: A line about introspection and emotional heaviness during solitude.

olen.author: ARO
olen.en_text: There are unspoken words in the heart
olen.description: Represents suppressed emotions and feelings left unsaid.

olen.author: ARO
olen.en_text: Time passes, but traces remain
olen.description: A philosophical statement about memory and lasting impact.

olen.author: ARO
olen.en_text: I am searching for myself
olen.description: A theme of identity and self-discovery.

olen.author: ARO
olen.en_text: The weight of feelings is heavy
olen.description: Emphasizes emotional burden using physical metaphor.

olen.author: Qazaq halyq änі
olen.en_text: Oh my people, my land
olen.description: A cry of sorrow and love for the homeland, expressing collective pain.

olen.author: Qazaq halyq änі
olen.en_text: Ancestral land, golden soil
olen.description: Highlights the sacred value of homeland and heritage.

olen.author: Qazaq halyq änі
olen.en_text: My soul is restless, my heart has no calm
olen.description: Describes emotional unrest and inner turmoil.

olen.author: Abai Qunanbaiuly
olen.en_text: Leave behind profit and vanity
olen.description: A moral call to reject materialism and ego.

olen.author: Abai Qunanbaiuly
olen.en_text: Anger is an enemy, wisdom is a friend
olen.description: A concise ethical formula contrasting destructive emotion with guiding intellect.
